channel.title: Coffee on Tiny Tavern
channel.description: Recent content in Coffee on Tiny Tavern

item.title: Affogato
item.description: A scoop of ice cream mixed with a hot shot of coffee. Served with your choice of vanilla or chocolate ice cream.

item.title: Americano
item.description: This drink is a traditional coffee beverage, topped with a layer of crema

item.title: Cappuccino
item.description: This smooth, creamy, and classic coffee beverage is whipped and topped with a layer of foamed milk

item.title: Caramel Dalgona
item.description: This version of the Dalgona blends caramel syrup into the foamy coffee creation

item.title: Caramel Latte
item.description: This delicious coffee drink is infused with caramel syrup and topped with a layer of foamed milk or whipped cream

item.title: Caramel Macchiato
item.description: This premium coffee beverage is whipped to perfection and topped with a layer of foamed milk or whipped cream

item.title: Chocolate Mocha
item.description: The perfect balance of coffee and chocolate, topped with whipped cream and chocolate syrup

item.title: Dalgona/Whipped Coffee
item.description: This deliciously whisked caffeine drink is topped with a floating infusion of coffee goodness

item.title: Spanish Latte
item.description: This version of a latte is made with sweetened condensed milk, whipped to perfection, and topped with foamed milk or whipped cream
